'''''"Polychrome Tri-Stars"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend|Local Legends]] {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer|text=Polychrome Tri-Stars: Vasily}}, {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire|text=Polychrome Tri-Stars: Sidorenko}}, and {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard|text=Polychrome Tri-Stars: Nomokonov}}.
